title: Authors and Citation
text: Zhao S (2023). diffdriver: Identify differential selection. R package version 0.1.1.
code: @Manual{,   title = {diffdriver: Identify differential selection},   author = {Siming Zhao},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.1.1}, }

title: Identify differential selection
text: included example scripts run diffdriver. Please take look scripts/ folder. run_diffdriver.R gives example run diffdriver using example files provided package. can download script run Rscript run_diffdriver.R command line. Note, suggested run drivermaps actual run order prepare required inputs diffdriver. run_simulate_singlegene.R gives example perform simulations. generate mutation phenotype data single gene many times, assuming differential selection , check many times can detect using. can download script run Rscript run_simulate_singlegene.R command line.

title: Detect the relationship between a specified phenotype and mutation — diffdriver
text: genef Link files name genes included analysis mutf Link mutation file, use driverMAPS mutation input format phenof Link phenoptype file, SampleID <tab> Phenotype <tab> Nsyn. nsyn number syn mutations sample. j index phenotype k specified number components NMF mode Mode indicating type nucleotide change. case mode=1 corresponds regular change mode=2 mutation signature case. model type annotation. case mode=1 regular annotation case mode=2 signature annotation file
